TopicTitle: MechJeb don't show the correct info of jet engines

Articles.Content:
When you are using jet engine for LKO or something, the Current Acceleration/Thrust is always constant and just related to your thrust output (changed with shift/ctrl by default)

As you see, when I hold shift to maximize output, the real thrust is not at full power because of low air intake, but MechJeb think it is, while Engineer displayed the real value.

MechJeb seems also ignored the delta-v from jet engine

It this a bug? Will MechJeb fix that in future release?
